meanings.definition: The treatment of disease by the use of chemical substances, especially the treatment of cancer by cytotoxic and other drugs.
meanings.sent1: Chemotherapies are often used to help fight cancer in patients.
meanings.sent2: Doctors recommended chemotherapies to treat the patient's leukemia.
meanings.sent3: The chemotherapies danced around the cancer cells, trying to defeat them.
meanings.sent4: Her body saw chemotherapies as brave warriors fighting the evil cancer invaders.
meanings.sent5: The chemotherapies acted like tiny soldiers attacking the enemy within.

meanings.definition: The use of chemical substances in the treatment of disease, especially cancer.
meanings.sent1: Chemotherapies can have side effects like hair loss and nausea.
meanings.sent2: The hospital specializes in providing chemotherapies to cancer patients.
meanings.sent3: The chemotherapies whispered to the cancer cells, 'You're in trouble now.'
meanings.sent4: In the battle against cancer, chemotherapies are the powerful weapons.
meanings.sent5: The chemotherapies worked tirelessly to destroy the cancer cells.
